name: Extinction To Genesis: Raptor Rampage
description:
In the world of "Genesis Island", dinosaurs are being created with the purpose to attract visitor to the park. Two young raptor escaped from there containment area and explore the island in which they were created on.

This game is in a prototype phase, the final art for this game has not created. These are place holders until game is in production, when I am far into production I will upload the demo with the final art.

Here is what I have so far. It's just the raptor. Testing the animation with key press.

Press D to run to the right.

Press A to run to the left.

Press S  to crouch.

Press S while pressing A or D to crouch run.

Press J to attack.

Press K to eat.

Press Space to Jump.
